description: React component for a course player interface, allowing users to load course data, track progress, and mark completion.

methods.name: CoursePlayer
methods.description: Main React functional component for course interaction, managing state and side effects.

methods.name: saveProgress
methods.description: Function to update user's course progress and handle saving state.

methods.name: markComplete
methods.description: Function to mark the course as complete by setting progress to 100%.
